title: How to Put Music on a 3DS

steps.headline: Slide the 3DS SD card into your computer.
Right click and create a new folder named "music."
Open the folder.
steps.description: Input all of the music you'd like to listen to on the 3DS. Be mindful of space limitations.

steps.headline: Slide the SD card back in your 3DS.
steps.description: Open sound and begin playing the music.

text: Slide the 3DS SD card into your computer.  Right click and create a new folder named "music."  Open the folder. Input all of the music you'd like to listen to on the 3DS. Be mindful of space limitations. Slide the SD card back in your 3DS. Open sound and begin playing the music.
